Zukunft Stromsystem.title: Zukunft Stromsystem
Zukunft Stromsystem.abstract: Analysis of reasoning and organization of  change away from fossil electricity generation

sectors.name: CRF sector (IPCC 2006): manufacturing industries and construction
CRF sector (IPCC 2006): manufacture of solid fuels and other energy industries

scenarios.name: Referenz-Szenario
scenarios.definition: Historical scenario with oil price projection, price path with a high price level of fuel

scenarios.name: Schnellausstiegs-Szenario
scenarios.definition: Very ambitioned expansion of renewable energy, orientated on qualitative determined technical limitations of exit strategy, regulatory practicability ignored

scenarios.name: Laufzeitbegrenzungs-Szenario for 20 years (EEG)
scenarios.definition: Operating time of power plants limited, disconnection of coal power plants according to model of withdrawal from nuclear energy programme

scenarios.name: Laufzeitbegrenzungs-Szenario for 25 years (EEG)
scenarios.definition: Operating time of power plants limited, disconnection of coal power plants according to model of withdrawal from nuclear energy programme

scenarios.name: Laufzeitbegrenzungs-Szenario for 30 years (EEG)
scenarios.definition: Operating time of power plants limited, disconnection of coal power plants according to model of withdrawal from nuclear energy programme

scenarios.name: Laufzeitbrezungs-Szenario for 20 years
scenarios.definition: Operating time of power plants limited, technical practicability limits of expansion of renewable energy are not completely exploited

scenarios.name: Laufzeitbrezungs-Szenario for 25 years
scenarios.definition: Operating time of power plants limited, technical practicability limits of expansion of renewable energy are not completely exploited

scenarios.name: Laufzeitbrezungs-Szenario for 30 years
scenarios.definition: Operating time of power plants limited, technical practicability limits of expansion of renewable energy are not completely exploited

scenarios.name: Transformations-Szenario
scenarios.definition: Ambitioned expansion of renewable energies/ power plant complex, CO2 optimisation of power plants by 21st  year of operation
